projects.name: ELECTROMART
projects.description: Architected, designed, and implemented a full-stack e-commerce app with user authentication (JWT). Payment integration.authentication and Razorpay for payments. Designed and implemented a responsive UI using Next UI and Tailwind CSS. Enhanced security by implementing robust password hashing and salting techniques to protect user data.

projects.name: MEETUP
projects.description: Built a real-time video calling web app using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Socket.IO, and Peer.js. Optimized performance by using Next.js for efficient routing and server-side rendering, reducing load times. Integrated Socket.IO for smooth data exchange between clients and servers during calls. Implemented peer-to-peer connections with Peer.js, facilitating direct communication between users.

projects.name: PROJECTNEST
projects.description: Engineered 'Project Nest' with Next.js, Node.js, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS, creating a comprehensive project management tool. Integrated JWT and Firebase for Google authentication. Facilitated team collaboration with features like chat, task assignment, and member management, improving team productivity.

experiences.description: Significantly enhanced projects with React, Firebase, and Bootstrap by constructing dynamic, responsive interfaces, contributing to improved user engagement. Resolved development challenges by showcasing strong problem-solving skills, leading to a 20% reduction in bug reports. Implemented seamless integration of Firebase, elevating the functionality and interactivity of web applications, resulting in a 15% increase in user retention.

full_output.name: PRASHANT SHARMA
achievements_and_awards: Achieved a 1600+ rating and solved 800+ question on Leetcode
